name: Star Hawks (Pre-Alpha Demo Build)
description:
Story

You play an elite pilot how controls an star fighter ship. Your Mission is to fight your way trough the enemy line to prevent the completion of an  Anti-Matter-Weapon, witch is  underconstruction in a Factory on the surface of the distant desert Planet Thesra-9.   

Developers intend

Star Hawk is an retro spaceship-Arcade Game, combined with modern 3D-Graphic and Controls.

The current version is an pre-alpha demo build. It depicts an early state in development. Its my first attempt to build an Game from scratch. Programming, Graphic, Sound and Music are created from me alone. Its a learning experience for me, i would appreciate your honest opinion. This build encompass only three level of 10 i have in mind.

If you find bugs or substantial design flaws, feel free to let me know in the comments. I am still learning and every feedback is helpful.

enjoy the experience
